    • append

      public static int[] append(int[] ar, int value)
      Create a new array with a value appended at the end
      Parameters:
      ar - original array
      value - the value that will be appended to the array
      Returns:
      new (ar.length + 1 long) array with the appended value

    • prepend

      public static int[] prepend(int[] ar, int value)
      Create a new array with a value prepended at the beginning
      Parameters:
      ar - original array
      value - the value that will be prepended to the array
      Returns:
      new (ar.length + 1 long) array with the prepended value

      Parameters:
      ar1 - original array
      ar2 - array to copy into

    • arrayCopy

      public static void arrayCopy(int[] ar1, int[] ar2, int startIndex)
      Copy ar2 into ar1 at a specific position
      Parameters:
      ar1 - original array
      ar2 - array to copy into
      startIndex - startIndex where at2 starts

    • delete

      public static int[] delete(int[] ar, int index)
      Delete a value from an array
      Parameters:
      ar - array to delete in
      index - index of value to delete - if index > ar.length, the last position will be removed.
      Returns:
      new array with the value removed
